# MACaptionAppearanceSetActiveProfileID(_:) | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Media Accessibility ](/documentation/mediaaccessibility)

- [ MACaptionAppearanceSetActiveProfileID(_:) ](/documentation/MediaAccessibility/MACaptionAppearanceSetActiveProfileID(_:))

-  MACaptionAppearanceSetActiveProfileID(_:) 

Function# MACaptionAppearanceSetActiveProfileID(_:)

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+

```
func MACaptionAppearanceSetActiveProfileID(_ profileID: CFString)
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/MediaAccessibility/MACaptionAppearanceSetActiveProfileID(_:)#parameters)

`profileID`The profileID to make active.

## [Discussion](/documentation/MediaAccessibility/MACaptionAppearanceSetActiveProfileID(_:)#discussion)

Sets the currently-selected caption drawing profileID system wide. Behavior is undefined if NULL or an invalid profileID is provided
